MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Laurieston, affecting properties in Old Redding Road  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:37am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional engineers required to assist with investigations and repairs to a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:25pm on the 28th of April 2021.
